title: Software Engineer ( Nov 2018 - Jul 2019)
description: Designed wireframes for a newer version of legacy software which resulted in enhanced user experience. This included designing mockups using Sketch after coordinating with users and product owners

Re-engineered the user interface from Angular JS to a React app and integrated the same with a Jenkins pipeline to eliminate manual deployments. The technologies used were Node JS + React + Ant Design .

title: Software Engineer ( July 2017 - Nov 2018)
description: Engineered a hybrid mobile application using Ionic 2 for tracking surgical kits as part of an asset management system that resulted in increased availability of assets and reduced losses.
Developed REST API’s to support the user mobile app using Node JS (Express).
Built user interface using React for a product which managed the lifecycle of GE’s aviation engines and saved $650 - $700M in operational costs each year.
Worked in a team of five to design a crash course on Predix, a cloud platform by GE for internet of things.
Conducted sessions for hands on training of Predix across multiple GE sites resulting in increased knowledge transfer.

title: Software Engineering Specialist ( July 2016 - July 2017)
description: Piloted a project for monitoring cleanrooms by developing a solution prototype after a factory visit and eventually scaled the tool across fifteen GE sites.
Coordinated with technical architects and onsite engineers to configure edge devices using python that collected and ingested real-time temperature, humidity, and particle count data onto the cloud.
Developed a suite of desktop and web application using Angular and Electron to visualize real-time data and trigger notifications on abnormalities which reduced manufacturing defects by 15%.
